nodes.text: The Alisandre Hotel was a hotel located in the Federal District of the planet Coruscant. In business since at least the High Republic Era, it continued operating into the Imperial Era. The hotel's ballroom was thought to be one of the biggest in the Federal District. It also had a concentration of smaller rooms surrounding it where, during large gatherings, people would meet more privately. During the early days of the Galactic Empire, an Ascension Week celebration took place in the hotel.
